name: Busta Bunyip
description:
SUBMIT YOUR HIGHSCORE IN THE COMMENTS, WE'D LOVE TO SEE EM!<3 HOW TO PLAY:

- Type the word above the enemy's head to punch them! 

- At the top-right of the game you'll see a bar that slowly goes down when enemies are nearby, that bar is a timer that indicates how long you have to kill the enemy before the hit you!

- Stack up points by building your combo up! But watch out.. every missed/ wrongly typed letter will HALF your combo! 

- You can find your health by looking at the heart container at the top, you get THREE lives indicated by the health-locket slowly draining.

Made with love by Teo, Mantas, Connor, Patrycja, Patrick and Jack.

Enjoy <3
